content: hunglish knitter bonus lace tee this is the bonus pattern for the hunglish lace tee the lace pattern in this case is made on the front instead of on the sleeves find a tutorial for the front lace pattern on hunglish knitter youtube channel https //www youtube com/@hunglishknitter for detailed sweater instructions check out the tutorial video for the hunglish lace tee sizes s m l xl xxl chest circumference the sizes s m l xl xxl are designed to fit an approximate bust circumference of 90-95 95-100 105- 110 110-115 115-120 cm 35 4-37 4 37 4-39 3 41 3-43 3 43 3-45 2 45 2 -47 2 inches gauge 23 sts x 30 row in stockinet stitch on 4 mm us8 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches needles circular needles 4 mm us6 and 3 mm us2 5 materials 8 stitch markers for the raglan bobby pins or stitch markers for the bobby pin technique yarn suggested yarn weight 3light shown here in mondial anna 100 % acrylic antipilling yarn 3 5 oz / 100 g = 371 yd /340 m estimated skeins needed depending on the length 2 3 4 5 6 times of 3 5 oz / 100 g = 371 yd /340 m 3light weight yar page 1 of 9 pattern the sweater is worked top down with raglan increases on the yoke short row are worked at the back of the neck with bobby pin technique after raglan increases the yoke is divided for body and sleeves and the whole sweater is worked in the round with magic loop technique for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel https //www youtube com/@hunglishknitter raglan instructions increases are worked differently before and after raglan stitches and differently on the right side or on the wrong side they are worked as follows see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel m1r from the rs insert the left needle under the strand that runs between two stitches from back to front then knit this strand from the ws insert the left needle under the strand that runs between two stitches from front to back then purl this strand through the back loop twisted m1l from the rs insert the left needle under the strand that runs between two stitches from front to back then knit this strand through the back loop twisted from the ws insert the left needle under the strand that runs
